answers.answer: I can review your films and your hormone profile free of charge if you want.Some of these lesions require surgical resection
Dear Dr. Prevedello, thanks so much!!!  how can I send you the films please?  I'm having vertigo, nausea and vomiting and chronic fatigue.  I really appreciate it!!!
I took an aspirin and hope my brain is getting enough blood and I don't have diabetes
Dear ill13632You can send it to me on:410 W. 10th avenueN-1011 Doan HallColumbus , Ohio43210Please also send info so I can get in contact.Thank you

question: I had an MRI which showed a 1.0cm Clival Lesion eroding my clivus.  My prolactin levels on one test were high and my cortisol and other hormones are low.  I have central sleep apnea and O2 of 70% and chronic fatigue.  Do I need surgery for this?  Thanks very much!
title: Clival Lesion, Need Surgery??
